hero.subtitle: What Mexico buys — spending categories from government procurement
hero.detail: 72 regex-based categories classify 3.1M contracts (2002-2025) by title with accent-aware matching. Coverage: ~84% specific, ~16% unclassified.

treemap.title: Category Treemap by Value
treemap.description: Size represents total contract value. Colors indicate sector classification.
treemap.empty: No category data available yet. Please contact your administrator.

table.title: Top Categories
table.empty: No categories found. Category data may not be available yet.

trends.title: Spending Trends — Top 5 Categories
trends.description: Year-over-year contract value for the five largest spending categories.
